products.title: Joyford Linen Stone Roman Blind
products.description: An affordable textured weave fabric, their joyford range comes in a few neutral grey tones. Great for minimalist homes or to add an earthy finish to your room. This earthy greige (grey/brown) linen-look fabric, compliments any decor choice, add to a rustic farm kitchen, mediterranean bedroom or minimalist modern living space. Product id: db-rom0976 fabric colour: linen stone material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Verve Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Their verve range is a stunning print that will add flair to your home, available in 3 colourways provided by one of the industry leading textile manufacturers, prestigious textiles. Displaying a geometric pattern in stunning grey, yellow and cream tones, this trending roman blind will inject style into your home. At swift direct blinds we take pride in handcrafting all their roman blinds here in their west yorkshire factory.

products.title: Art Deco Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Sleek, stylish and timeless, their art deco linen roman blind adds a contemporary feel to classic art-deco design. A soft statement piece made from 100% cotton, this roman blind exudes class and sophistication in stylish neutral cream shades. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman blind comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching curtain.

products.title: Lottie Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Make a lasting update to your interior with this quality jacquard fabric window blind. The lottie linen roman blind benefits from a super practical design that provides effective shading as well as a neat and tidy appearance at your window. It also features a gorgeous pattern of fern leaves in neutral linen tones and will blend effortlessly with a range of interior styles and colour schemes. Product id: db-rom1058 fabric colour: linen material: 75% polyester 25% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Bumblebee Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Its the bees knees and fully on trend for todays living. Available in four colourways the design will bring a little nature to your interior. Suitable for both the traditional and contemporary home this simple yet effective design, with a natural linen colour background, will become a focal feature of your room. We pride ourselves on their manufacturing since quality is important to us. Be assured their skilled seamstresses will create you a perfect made to measure blind which you will be proud of.

products.title: Dragonfly Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Pull out the tender greens of the hand sketched dragonflies on the dragonfly roman blind by pairing it against strong surfaces. Or add a dash of humour to a serious space such as an office or bathroom. This incredibly versatile blind is further enhanced because weve invested in a deluxe blend of cotton and linen meaning that the fabric breathes so you can confidently hang it throughout your home.

products.title: Chic Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Do you have a rustic home that needs luxurious window coverings without conflicting with exposed brickwork or historical features? Then look no further than the chic roman blind in the linen colourway. Dont be fooled, this fabric wont crease, we've spun it from an indulgent fabric which falls in glorious loose folds while the matching metallic yarn glitters in the sunshine. Product id: db-rom1104 fabric colour: linen material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Artichoke Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Their artichoke design, inspired by the favourite european vegetable, blends reds and greens together on a light cream linen background to create a classic pattern with a modern twist. Perfect for adding flair to a kitchen or dining room. A cotton/linen blend fabric, makes this roman blind breathable and light - wonderful for temperature regulation. Not only is this roman blind made in yorkshire by us, we also offer a fantastic five year guarantee on this product.
